attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You are apparently four times more likely to have an accident when driving if you are using a mobile phone...........

Well, it is surely much more dangerous to smoke while driving then?  If a cigarette fell on your lap you are near enough certain to crash, and what about all these people who flick the ash/cigarette out the window - won't the prospect of the backseat of your car going up in flames lead to an accident?

I think so!

This is not a petition against smokers, it is merely a petition to get the government to wake up to reality, this is much more dangerous than using a silly phone.

If three points is good enough for mobile phone users its good enough for this!  It is an absolute joke that this is not law anyway - no smoking while driving!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
